casebody.data:
STATE of Missouri, Respondent,
v.
Norman Edward DAVIS, Appellant. WD 80089 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. Order filed: August 14, 2018
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied September 25, 2018
Application for Transfer Denied December 4, 2018 Mary H. Moore, for Respondent Ellen H. Flottman, for Appellant Before Division Three: Anthony Rex Gabbert, Presiding Judge, Victor C. Howard, Judge and Alok Ahuja, Judge ORDER PER CURIAM:

Norman Davis appeals his convictions following a jury trial of three counts of statutory sodomy in the second degree, section 566.064, RSMo 2016, one count of attempted statutory sodomy in the second degree, section 566.064, RSMo 2016, and one count of patronizing prostitution, section 567.030, RSMo 2016. On appeal, he challenges two evidentiary rulings. Because a published opinion would have no precedential value, a memorandum has been provided to the parties. The judgment of convictions is affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
